questions.question_text: Which two third-party services are currently supported integrations into the Workspace ONE Intelligence Portal? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:

SAML is a markup language, the token technology is oAuth2.

questions.question_text: What type of authentication token is used by the IDM API?
Which statement is true about device compliance policy and email compliance policy?

choices.A: If compliance criteria is available from both device compliance policy and email compliance policy, VMware recommends configuring this criteria with device compliance policy
choices.B: If compliance criteria is available from both device compliance policy and email compliance policy, VMware recommends configuring this criteria with email compliance policy
choices.D: If compliance criteria is available from both device compliance policy and email compliance policy, VMware recommends configuring this criteria with both device compliance policy and email compliance policy
choices.C: VMware recommends leveraging the Automation feature built into the Workspace ONE Intelligence to manage device and email compliance
The ability to sync user groups
choices.B: The ability to create user groups
choices.D: The ability to create organization group
choices.A: The ability to create assignment groups
